初遇.encontent:
Welcome to sail with us! Well, now, go to the back
 of the ship and make it move! Don't be dawdling!
初遇.content:
感谢你成为我的船员～好了！现在，马上滚到船屁股后边
儿，让船动起来！别偷懒！

箱中气候.encontent:
Ahem! Before I get sunburnt, I should go to the Viking's
 Bar and drink with Old Andy ...
箱中气候.content:
咳咳！在晒伤之前，我或许该去维京酒吧找安迪老头喝一
杯……

致未来.encontent:
One day, I shall make the Stillwater Lake School my territory!
 Jack, that tattletale, will be flushing the toilet, and Mr Williams
 of the Viking Club will be my first mate ...
致未来.content:
总有一天，整个静水湖小学都将成为我的领地！我要让打
小报告的杰克去冲洗厕所，至于维京俱乐部的威廉老师，他
将成为我的大副……

孑立.encontent:
Hey, heeeey? Where are all the people? Erick the Fearless
 is not afraid of standing alone ...
孑立.content: 嗨、嗨？人都去哪了？勇敢的埃里克可不怕一个人……

问候.encontent:
Squat down when you are before me. Do not make me look
 up. That's so very disrespectful to a Lord!
问候.content:
见到我，你就要蹲下来。不准让我仰起头看你，这对领主
来说有失尊敬！

朝晨.encontent:
Keep your eyes open and get it together! Valhalla does
 not welcome sleepy heads.
朝晨.content: 睁大眼睛，打起精神！英灵殿不欢迎懒惰的瞌睡虫。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Oh, shoot! The homework! My homework ... I haven't
 written anything yet!
信任-朝晨.content: 糟了！作业！我的家庭作业——我还一个字都没写呢！

夜暮.encontent:
I'm going to bed now. Any raiding plans can wait till
 tomorrow ...
夜暮.content: 我要先睡了，有什么掠夺计划明天再说吧……

信任-夜暮.encontent:
Gather around, brothers and sisters! Let me tell you
 the legend of my mother Lagertha who defeated two
 bears on her own ...
信任-夜暮.content:
过来，我的船员！让我给你讲讲，我妈妈拉葛莎独自打败
两只棕熊的荣誉事迹……

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
I've taken an oath ... Until the day my longship sets
 sail to the sea, I will never, ever get my hair cut.
帽檐与发鬓.content:
我发过一个誓……在我的长船开到海上之前，我绝对不会
剪我的头发。

袖与手.encontent:
Don't touch me! Unless you are going to pull me up
 from the cliff, or, take me to the Ocean Funland ...
袖与手.content:
别牵我！除非你要把我从海崖拉上来，或者，要带我去海
上乐园……

衣着与身形.encontent:
Like what you see? Worry not, you will also be rewarded
 with these if you stay long enough in the fleet!
衣着与身形.content:
看上什么了？放心，只要你在船队好好干，你也会拥有这
些的！

嗜好.encontent:
I've only seen her in the photos. Harald said she has
 Thor's courage and Sif's charm. She must be the most
 beautiful Valkyrie in Valhalla.
嗜好.content:
我只在照片里见过她，哈拉尔说她像索尔一样勇猛，如西
芙女神般动人。她一定会是瓦尔哈拉里最美丽的女武神。

赞赏.encontent:
Your courage impressed me. I will appoint you to be
 my helmsman, and put you in command of that open space
 in the park!
赞赏.content:
你的勇气令我对你刮目相看。我决定任命你为舵手，并且
将公园空地的管理权交给你！

亲昵.encontent:
Tomorrow is "Best Friends Day" at school. Now that
 I have given you my invitation, you are not allowed
 to present as another's friend!
亲昵.content:
明天是学校的“最佳朋友日”，我已经邀请你了，你可不
能作为其他人的朋友去参加！

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
That Sonetto girl, I heard that she's a skald ... I happen to
 need someone to sing my legends across the lands ... Hmph, no
 one can turn down a full box of Twizzlers!
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
那个叫十四行诗的家伙，似乎是一位吟游诗人……我正缺
人传颂我的伟大事迹——哼哼，没有人会拒绝一整箱扭扭
糖！

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
Old John wants to put that arm ring on me, so that I will become
 a little girl who needs his protection! But I will not! I will
 become a warrior like my mother.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
老约翰想让我戴上臂环，那样我就会变成一个需要他保护
的小女孩儿了！我才不会依靠他！我要成为像妈妈那样的
战士。

独白.encontent:
My mother is the strongest and most beautiful Valkyrie, and I
 am the strongest and bravest Viking across all the lands and
 seas. When my day comes, she will ride across the sky in her
 finest armor, taking me to sup in Odin's great hall ...
独白.content:
我的妈妈是最美、最强大的女武神，而我是大陆与海洋上
最强、最勇敢的维京战士。当我前往瓦尔哈拉的那天，她
会穿着最美丽的铠甲来迎接我……

入队.encontent: Ready to show them a good fight?
入队.content: 准备好让他们屁滚尿流了吗？

战前.encontent: Suffer the loss, or suffer the notch!

择选咒语Ⅱ.encontent: The axe told me it's ready!

择选至终的仪式.encontent: Hoist the sails! We will not be stopped!

召唤至终的仪式.encontent:
The rage of the sea will claim you! Like ... the anger
 of a teacher!
召唤至终的仪式.content: 你们将承受海的狂怒！就像……生气的老师一样！

战斗胜利.encontent: As they fell, Lord Erick embarks on her legendary journey!
战斗胜利.content: 跨过这些家伙，埃里克领主自此开始了她的史诗之路！

洞悉.encontent:
Thank you for paying the tribute! Lord Erick will promise
 you more lands and wealth!
洞悉.content: 谢谢你的进贡！埃里克领主会考虑给你追封领地的！

洞悉之底.encontent:
Riding the winds and waves, Lord Erick is setting out
 for her great journey! ... If you need the loo, go
 now.
洞悉之底.content:
乘风破浪，埃里克领主即将启航！——要上厕所的家伙抓
紧了。
